The future of AI-assisted development lies not in generating fancier code, but in more precise requirement expression.
2.
A personal thought: I believe it's not about choosing Vibe Specs or Context Engineering and completely abandoning "Vibe Coding". AI's knowledge base far exceeds that of humans. Overly strict limitations may prevent AI from unleashing its true potential. Within a small, controllable scope, letting AI freely explore might lead to winning the "jackpot".
